title: lol patcher is very slow download
body:
the download speed is 15 kb!!
but my  IDM download with 230 kbs

please help me

replies.body:
It seems very weird that your download speed would be so incredibly slow.  It is possible that something is throttling your connection so that it cannot download at its normal speeds.  To improve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  There are a lot of steps there, but they should help in getting your patcher to speed up!

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues even after these steps!
